data.message: when i was in like 5th grade, i finally made enough money to buy the slim shady album, had my brothers go and cop it for me with my money, they came back and told me that album sucks! then when em came out with his second album, they were all on his nuts and became their favorite rapper, im like i told u muthafuckerz lol

replies.message: God, I was too. when i was young, I hate shady's high tone rappin flow. But now  i know., shady's 1,2st album was best of shady's thing.
홍원표 yeah man u get it, those were shady everything after that was marshall, i still kind of liked relapse too that shit was funny lol
Relapse whatever everybody says is the best in recent years. SSLP clearly the greatest tho
